metadata.title: CVE-2017-14122 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
unrar 0.0.1 (aka unrar-free or unrar-gpl) suffers from a stack-based bufferover-read in unrarlib.c, related to ExtrFile and stricomp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrar-free - 1:0.0.1+cvs20140707-4~build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-free package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.0.1+cvs20140707-4~build0.16.04.1').
